question: Noah was a pen pal with 7 people. He stopped being penpals with 2 of them. They each send 3 letters a week that are 6 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 9 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Noah is penpals with 7-2=<<7-2=5>>5 people
Thus he gets 5*3=<<5*3=15>>15 letters a week
So he writes 15*6=<<15*6=90>>90 pages a week
So he writes for 90*9=<<90*9=810>>810 minutes a week
So he writes 810/60=<<810/60=13>>13 hours a week
#### 13
